post.description: This endpoint allows subscribing earn product
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint allows subscribing earn product

delete.description: This endpoint allows initiating redemption by holding ID. If the current holding is fully redeemed or in the process of being redeemed, it indicates that the holding does not exist.

parameters.name: fromAccountType
parameters.description: Account type: MAIN (funding account), TRADE (spot trading account). This parameter is valid only when orderId=ETH2

parameters.name: confirmPunishRedeem
parameters.description: Confirmation field for early redemption penalty: 1 (confirm early redemption, and the current holding will be fully redeemed). This parameter is valid only for fixed-term products

delete.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint allows initiating redemption by holding ID. If the current holding is fully redeemed or in the process of being redeemed, it indicates that the holding does not exist.

get.description: This endpoint allows subscribing earn products

parameters.name: fromAccountType
parameters.description: Account type: MAIN (funding account), TRADE (spot trading account). This parameter is valid only when orderId=ETH2

penaltyInterestAmount.description: Penalty interest amount, incurred for early redemption of fixed-term products

redeemAll.description: Whether the entire holding must be redeemed, required for early redemption of fixed-term products

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint allows subscribing earn products

get.description: This endpoint can get available savings products. If no products are available, an empty list is returned.

lockStartTime.description: Product earliest interest start time, in milliseconds

returnRate.description: Annualized Rate of Return, for example, 0.035 is equal to 3.5% annualized rate of return

earlyRedeemSupported.description: Whether the fixed product supports early redemption: 0 (no), 1 (yes)

status.description: Product status: ONGOING(Subscription in progress), PENDING(Preheating Subscription), FULL(Subscribed), INTERESTING (Interest in progress)

redeemType.description: Redemption channel: MANUAL (manual redemption), TRANS_DEMAND (transfer to corresponding demand product upon maturity), AUTO (redeem to funding account upon maturity)

incomeReleaseType.description: Income release type: DAILY (daily release), AFTER (release after product ends)

newUserOnly.description: Whether the product is exclusive for new users: 0 (no), 1 (yes)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can get available savings products. If no products are available, an empty list is returned.

get.description: This endpoint can get available limited-time promotion products. If no products are available, an empty list is returned.

lockStartTime.description: Product earliest interest start time, in milliseconds

lockEndTime.description: Product earliest interest end time, in milliseconds

returnRate.description: Annualized Rate of Return, for example, 0.035 is equal to 3.5% annualized rate of return

earlyRedeemSupported.description: Whether the fixed product supports early redemption: 0 (no), 1 (yes)

status.description: Product status: ONGOING(Subscription in progress), PENDING(Preheating Subscription), FULL(Subscribed), INTERESTING (Interest in progress)

redeemType.description: Redemption channel: MANUAL (manual redemption), TRANS_DEMAND (transfer to corresponding demand product upon maturity), AUTO (redeem to funding account upon maturity)

incomeReleaseType.description: Income release type: DAILY (daily release), AFTER (release after product ends)

newUserOnly.description: Whether the product is exclusive for new users: 0 (no), 1 (yes)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can get available limited-time promotion products. If no products are available, an empty list is returned.

get.description: This endpoint can get current holding assets information. If no current holding assets are available, an empty list is returned.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

returnRate.description: Annualized Rate of Return, for example, 0.035 is equal to 3.5% annualized rate of return

lockStartTime.description: Product earliest interest start time, in milliseconds

purchaseTime.description: Most recent subscription time, in milliseconds

earlyRedeemSupported.description: Whether the fixed product supports early redemption: 0 (no), 1 (yes)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can get current holding assets information. If no current holding assets are available, an empty list is returned.
